abstract: An interesting looking grid from Tim Croce.
snippet: An interesting looking grid from Tim Croce.
lead_paragraph: FRIDAY'S PUZZLE - Interesting looking grid, isn't it? That was my first thought when I sat down to solve. All that wide, open space, and the black squares make the grid look like the number 8, if you squint a bit. I don't believe that has anything to do with solving the puzzle, but it was my first impression.
